DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to assess whether a SIMPLE or a COMPLEX strategy is best for the treatment of coronary bifurcation stenoses.
DOC.brief_title: BBC ONE - British Bifurcation Coronary Study
DOC.detailed_description: 500 patients will be randomised to either a SIMPLE strategy (provisional T stenting) or a COMPLEX strategy (crush or culotte stenting) with clinical follow-up at 9 months.
DOC.criteria: >18 years Coronary Bifurcation Lesion requiring treatment Cardiogenic Shock Acute MI Additional type C lesion for Rx platelets <50 LVEF <20%
